mapper.select: /* selectAdvrtsTpCode */ SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_VAL FROM dreamsearch.MOBON_COM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(TOT_EPRS_CNT) TOT_EPRS_CNT , ADVRTS_TP_CODE FROM MOB_MEDIA_PAR_MTH_STATS WHERE STATS_MTH = CAST(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') AS INT) GROUP BY ADVRTS_TP_CODE ) Z ON CODE_ID = ADVRTS_TP_CODE WHERE CODE_TP_ID = 'ADVRTS_TP_CODE' ORDER BY IFNULL(Z.TOT_EPRS_CNT,0) DESC , CODE_ID DESC

/* selectAdvrtsInfo */ SELECT DISTINCT SITE_CODE siteCode, KPI_NO kpiNo, advrtsId, ctgrSeq FROM ( SELECT SITE_CODE, KPI_NO, userid advrtsId, CTGR_SEQ ctgrSeq FROM dreamsearch.iadsite a left join dreamsearch.MOB_CTGR_USER_INFO b on a.userid=b.USER_ID WHERE SITE_CODE= CONVERT(#{siteCode} USING EUCKR) UNION ALL SELECT SITE_CODE, KPI_NO, userid advrtsId, CTGR_SEQ ctgrSeq FROM dreamsearch.adsite a left join dreamsearch.MOB_CTGR_USER_INFO b on a.userid=b.USER_ID WHERE SITE_CODE= CONVERT(#{siteCode} USING EUCKR) )A;

/* selectMediaInfo */ SELECT a.no scriptNo, a.userid scriptUserId, a.w_type platform, a.s_type product, a.ad_type type, ifnull(EPRS_REST_RATE, 100)EPRS_REST_RATE, ifnull(LPAD(b.scate,2,'0'),'99') mediaTpCode, CASE WHEN a.userid IN('kakao', 'mkakao') THEN '03' WHEN a.userid IN('agooglemedia', 'googlemedia', 'mgooglemedia') THEN '04' WHEN a.userid IN('padfit', 'madfit') THEN '05' WHEN a.userid IN('taboola', 'mtaboola') THEN '06' WHEN a.userid IN('exelbid', 'mexelbid') THEN '07' WHEN a.userid IN('igaworks', 'igaworks02','igaworksm','igaworksp') THEN '08' WHEN a.userid IN('rtbmobon', 'mrtbmobon') THEN '10' ELSE '01' END itlTpCode FROM dreamsearch.media_script a LEFT JOIN dreamsearch.media_site b ON a.mediasite_no=b.no WHERE a.NO=#{scriptNo}
